Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I am using Quest in the browser version, and I am trying to figure out how I can have a randomly generated code that you would have to type in to unlock a door.  I have a keypad that works, I just need to have it so when you look under one object, it gives you a randomly generated code  between 1-100.  
      I need it so you have to look under three different objects to get all three numbers for the code.
Posts.HTML:
Hello, I am using Quest in the browser version, and I am trying to figure out how I can have a randomly generated code that you would have to type in to unlock a door.  I have a keypad that works, I just need to have it so when you look under one object, it gives you a randomly generated code  between 1-100.  
  I need it so you have to look under three different objects to get all three numbers for the code.

Posts.EditableText:
There is a guide to doing just that:
http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/guides/unlockdoor.html
Posts.HTML:
There is a guide to doing just that:
http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/guides/unlockdoor.html
